body:
I think most people are not much aware of using C++ Wt, http://webtoolkit.eu. But i would like to say that Wt is a powerful C++ toolkit where we can develop high performance web applications like real time graphs, scientific calculations etc. Anyway it is web application and we can launch it by typing the url in a web browser. No need to download and install it. You can find more details from the above Wt link.

Anyway i have solved my issue with the help of Wt forum people, Koen. Please check the link for more details, http://redmine.emweb.be/boards/1/topics/12992?r=13005.

Ansif
title: Crash occurring in the Wt::DBO query
